com.apstrata.client.android.connection.Connection

Uses of Connection in com.apstrata.client.android
 

Methods in com.apstrata.client.android that return Connection
 Connection Client.getConn()
           
 

Methods in com.apstrata.client.android with parameters of type Connection
 void Client.setConn(Connection conn)
          sets a connection object for use in signing requests

Client(java.lang.String baseUrl, java.lang.String accKey, Connection conn)
           
 

Uses of Connection in com.apstrata.client.android.connection
 

Classes in com.apstrata.client.android.connection that implement Connection
 class AnonymousConnection
          this is the Connection implementation that generates request signatures for anonymous requests, hence its name, AnonymousConnection.
 class OwnerConnection
          this is the Connection implementation that generates request signatures using the account secret, hence its name, OwnerConnection.
 class TokenConnection
          this is the Connection implementation that generates request signatures using an authentication token, hence its name, TokenConnection.
 class UserConnection
          this is the Connection implementation that generates request signatures using a user name and password, hence its name, UserConnection.
